index.title: Fixedsorter
index.text:
What is Fixedsorter?

Fixedsorter is a political quiz that attempts to assign an ideology that matches your views the closest by asking questions to you based on a flowchart model. This idea was first conceived by TheGhostOfInky, but I (SoopaKhell) have made some modifications to the original test. Many of these modifications are minor, for example just changing the phrasing on some questions, some are major (for example, I removed distributism and the whole Georgism tree). These changes were made to make navigating the test easier and, hopefully, to make it more accurate.
